page.title: 06ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: On June 22nd it will be our{school {fete}when we try to raise money to buy new equipment for our school. There will be stalls selling home made sweets,books,toys,plants,handicraft, and jewellery.There will be games like tug of war,throw the sponge,beat the football keeper,throw the custard pie and a treasure hunt as well as a fancy hat and cake competition.There will be dog training and breakdancing displays ______________________________________ On April 17th the Brownies,Girl Guides Cubs and Scouts marched from the Cattle Market to the Parish Church. This was to remember{St. George's Day so we sang hymns and the vicar spoke to us. ______________________________________ I was in the{District Sports}and ran 50 m.There were skipping and running races.Winners go to the Area Sports.
